title: Account
body: Can someone help me? An unauthorized person hacked my account and changed the email and password and I want to change it back.

replies.body:
That can be scary, but don't worry because we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which allows you to submit an email you do have access to.  Our account team will investigate and help with recovery as well as information updates.  

In the meantime, check out our[ account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to help secure your info in and outside of league.  We'll reply back to your ticket form as soon as we can!
